nodes.text: Cogon was a male human who served as an officer of the Galactic Empire until he deserted a few years prior to the Battle of Yavin. Along with another defector, Swain, he stole a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle from the planet Lothal before going into hiding on the planet Thrad. Although Cogon and his comrade were supposed to join a rebel cell on the planet Klonoid, they were captured on Thrad by Agent Kallus of the Imperial Security Bureau before they could make it.
